message: Let's start fair. Take 10% and we'll see how the game goes.
You wanted to start fair, now it's your turn to make a tough decision!
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it closer to even.
You're getting closer to my number, but still not there. Keep trying!
Let's meet in the middle. This is a fair compromise for both of us.
I'm not budging, Alice. You're getting closer, but still too low!
I'm getting closer to your number, Bob. Let's find a solution that works for both of us.
Getting desperate, Alice. You're running out of time to meet my number!

No deal, Alice. It's all or nothing now. You'll get nothing.
